segment.source: User State Migration Tool (USMT) How-to topics

segment.source: The following table lists topics that describe how to use User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 to perform specific tasks.
segment.target: The following table lists topics that describe how to use User State Migration Tool (USMT) 10.0 to perform specific tasks.

segment.source: In This Section
segment.target: In This Section

segment.source: Topic
segment.target: Topic

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Exclude Files and Settings
segment.target: Exclude Files and Settings

segment.source: Create a custom .xml file to exclude files, file types, folders, or registry settings from your migration.
segment.target: Create a custom .xml file to exclude files, file types, folders, or registry settings from your migration.

segment.source: Extract Files from a Compressed USMT Migration Store
segment.target: Extract Files from a Compressed USMT Migration Store

segment.source: Recover files from a compressed migration store after installing the operating system.
segment.target: Recover files from a compressed migration store after installing the operating system.

segment.source: Include Files and Settings
segment.target: Include Files and Settings

segment.source: Create a custom .xml file to include files, file types, folders, or registry settings in your migration.
segment.target: Create a custom .xml file to include files, file types, folders, or registry settings in your migration.

segment.source: Migrate Application Settings
segment.target: Migrate Application Settings

segment.source: Migrate the settings of an application that the MigApp.xml file does not include by default.
segment.target: Migrate the settings of an application that the MigApp.xml file does not include by default.

segment.source: Migrate EFS Files and Certificates
segment.target: Migrate EFS Files and Certificates

segment.source: Migrate Encrypting File System (EFS) certificates by using USMT.
segment.target: Migrate Encrypting File System (EFS) certificates by using USMT.

segment.source: Migrate User Accounts
segment.target: Migrate User Accounts

segment.source: Specify the users to include and exclude in your migration.
segment.target: Specify the users to include and exclude in your migration.

segment.source: Reroute Files and Settings
segment.target: Reroute Files and Settings

segment.source: Create a custom .xml file to reroute files and settings during a migration.
segment.target: Create a custom .xml file to reroute files and settings during a migration.

segment.source: Verify the Condition of a Compressed Migration Store
segment.target: Verify the Condition of a Compressed Migration Store

segment.source: Determine whether a compressed migration store is intact, or whether it contains corrupt files or a corrupt catalog.
segment.target: Determine whether a compressed migration store is intact, or whether it contains corrupt files or a corrupt catalog.
